---
id: set-group-state
title: "Set group state"
description: "Set state for one or more groups. The ID parameter supports comma-separated IDs or names for multi-group targeting. Returns 200 on success, 207 on partial failure."
sidebar_label: "Set group state"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "put api-method"
info_path: docs/api/rest/keylightd-api
custom_edit_url: null
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Set group state"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/v1/groups/{id}/state"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Set state for one or more groups. The ID parameter supports comma-separated IDs or names for multi-group targeting. Returns 200 on success, 207 on partial failure.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>
  <Translate id="theme.openapi.request.title">Request</Translate>
